alert.note: Alert for Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Oktibbeha County through 915 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Longview, or 8 miles west of Starkville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Longview around 830 PM CDT. Starkville around 835 PM CDT. Craig Springs around 840 PM CDT. Sessums around 900 PM CDT. Oktoc around 905 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
